title: The Battle of Thermopylae
itunes:title: The Battle of Thermopylae
itunes:subtitle: Australians and New Zealanders on Leonidas' famed ground.
description:
In 1941 German troops invaded Greece. The Allied attempt to halt the Axis advance failed and the Allies headed south for evacuation. To buy time Australian and New Zealand troops fought a rear guard action in the same area where King Leonidas and his 300 Spartans had faced the invading army of Xerxes.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
